7.title: The Worst Ever! Console
7.plot: Sam picks the Sega Saturn, Lawrence picks the Sega Dreamcast, and Chad picks the Ouya as the worst video game consoles.

8.title: The Best Ever! Commercial
8.plot: There are plenty of memorable video game commercials, but Craig, Shaun, and Chad have the daunting task of picking their favorites: Craig chose the "A bit more" commercial for "Super Mario World", Shaun picked the "person in a Crash Bandicoot costume" commercials, and Chad chose the teddy bear getting chased by a tank in the "Battletanx" commercial.

2.title: The Worst Ever! Worst Villain
2.plot: According to ScrewAttack, the worst video game villains are: Brentalfloss picks Dr. Wily from the "Mega Man" series, James picks Wart from "Super Mario Bros. 2", and Ben and Nick pick Lysandre from "Pokemon X and Y".

3.title: The Best Ever! NES Game
3.plot: ScrewAttack unanimously agrees: The best NES game is "Super Mario Bros. 3".

4.title: The Worst Ever! Power-Ups
4.plot: Not all power-ups are helpful, and this list proves it. DJ Cutman picks the poison mushroom in the Japanese "Super Mario Bros. 2", Pat picks the frog suit in "Super Mario Bros. 3", and Chad picks the guitar in "Chester Cheetah's Too Cool to Fool".

12.title: The Best Ever! Studio EA Killed
12.plot: ScrewAttack salutes three great studios that Electronic Arts acquired: Origin Systems, Criterion Games, and Maxis Games (aka Will Wright).

13.title: The Worst Ever! Controller
13.plot: ScrewAttack lists three game controllers with serious design flaws: The Sega Dreamcast, the unofficial SuperPad 64 for Nintendo 64, and motion controls in general.

imdb.title: The Best Ever!
plot: ScrewAttack! staffers give their choices for the best or worst of a particular video game topic.
